title: The Patriots Did It Again | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin Clark and Danny Heifetz sit down for an emergency podcast to react to the New England Patriots signing Antonio Brown.



      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
